string.name: maxnew
string.u: I just immediately got the sense of this is where I am meant to be.

resources.string:
You can complete requirements for all of Saint Louis University’s nearly 100 degree programs at SLU-Madrid, including nursing, engineering and pre-med options. 


SLU’s Madrid Campus features newly renovated, historically protected buildings and is located in a safe, quiet neighborhood within minutes of the city center. 


IStudents studying at SLU-Madrid most often live with Spanish host families, although other options are available. 


Many academic courses at SLU-Madrid incorporate study trips to destinations in Spain and Europe.SLU-Madrid’s Office of Student Life also sponsors day and weekend excursions.
